title: Kilimambogo
summary: Kilimambogo is a popular hiking destination located along the Thika-Garissa Road in Machakos County, Kenya. It is known for its scenic beauty, diverse flora and fauna, and panoramic views of the surrounding landscapes.

title: Kanunga Falls
summary: Kanunga Falls is a stunning waterfall located near the Thika-Garissa Road in Machakos County, Kenya. It is a popular spot for hiking and nature enthusiasts, offering picturesque views and a refreshing atmosphere.

title: Ravenswood
summary: Ravenswood is a serene hiking destination located along the Thika-Garissa Road in Machakos County, Kenya. It is known for its tranquil environment, diverse wildlife, and scenic trails that attract nature lovers and hikers.

title: Kijabe Hill
summary: Kijabe Hill is a prominent hiking destination located near the Thika-Garissa Road in Machakos County, Kenya. It offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscapes and is a favorite spot for hikers and outdoor enthusiasts.
